Package projetofinalpoo

Class Student

java.lang.Object
projetofinalpoo.Researcher
projetofinalpoo.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Researcher>
public class Student
extends Researcher
A Student class is a child from the Researcher class. Besides all the variables that define a Researcher (and so it also defines a Student), a Student is defined by its thesis title, the thesis conclusion Date and the guiding Researcher. By default its type is set to "student".

A Students has constructors, sets, gets and toString() methods of its own, but it inherits all methods from the Researcher class.

See Also:
Researcher, Serialized Form

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email, ResearchGroup researchGroup, java.lang.String thesisTitle, Date conclusionDate, Researcher guidingResearcher)
      Constructor that initializes the Student and Researcher variables (name, email, research group, thesis title, thesis conclusion date and guiding researcher). The type of student is set to a default value of "student".
      Parameters:
      name - , name of the Student
      email - , email of the Student
      researchGroup - , researchGroup that the Student is in
      thesisTitle - , title of the thesis the Student wrote
      conclusionDate - , conclusion date of the thesis
      guidingResearcher - , Researcher that helps the Student
